# timetable-cli
## How to use
```
Usage: timetable-cli [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options:
  --config TEXT                  [required]
  --db TEXT                      [required]
  --debug
  -d, --global-timedelta TEXT
  -c, --columns TEXT
  --ignore-time-status
  --combine-title-and-variation
  --help                         Show this message and exit.

Commands:
  show
  watch
```
